item.description:
Please join us for a local foods potluck dinner hosted by Transition Newburyport! This outdoor event will be held on the lovely and inspiring grounds of New Eden Community Gardens in Newbury.

This is an opportunity to meet and talk with people working to promote sustainability within the communities of northern Essex County. It will be a fun event where you will meet local food producers, advocates for regional food security, gardeners, cooks and all sorts of interesting people.

The details:
Bring a potluck dish made from locally available foods.
Bring reusable eating utensils and dishes for yourself to eliminate waste produced from the meal.
Starting time is 5:30- show up when you can, but it will not run into the wee hours.
Grills will be available
Maybe bring a chair or plan to sit on the grass
Children are welcomed and encouraged to attend

More details here: http://transitionmass...
item.how_to_find_us: Park behind the church and we'll be set up above the gardens
item.name: Local Foods Potluck Party
